sentences.english: Rui Chenggang would appear to be the very model for such national image building.
sentences.chinese: 芮成鋼將會成爲國家形象建設的模範。

sentences.english: Rui Chenggang standed up, and picked up the mike, as if he standed on the tiger's back.
sentences.chinese: 芮成鋼站起來，拿過話筒，站到了虎背上。

sentences.english: He failed to got his face. So Obama had to answer Rui's question.
sentences.chinese: 無法下臺，奧巴馬只好回答了芮成鋼的問題。

sentences.english: Mr. Rui heroes will be presided over entrepreneurship.
sentences.chinese: 芮成鋼主持創業英雄會。

definition: surname Di/variant of 狄[Di2], generic name for northern ethnic minorities during the Qin and Han Dynasties (221 BC-220 AD)
to eat/(extended meaning) to endure/putrid smell/vegetables/roots (inextricably attached to the plant)
used in the transliteration of people's names
surname Lou/one of the 28 lunar mansions in Chinese astronomy
edge of a tortoiseshell/see 冉冉[ran3 ran3]
surname Pan/Pan, faun in Greek mythology, son of Hermes
surname Luo/old name of several rivers (in Henan, Shaanxi, Sichuan and Anhui)
